name: Clefable
Attack1Text: Return 1 of your Pokemon and all cards attached to it in your hand.

name: Deoxys
Attack1Text: Discard 2 Psychic Energy attached to Deoxys and remove 6 damage counters from Deoxys.

name: Dialga
Attack1Text: Shuffle your hand into your deck.

name: Espeon
Attack1Text: Move up to 4 damage counters from any of your Pokemon to any of your opponent's Pokemon in any way you like.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Forretress
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.
Attack2Text: Does 30 damage times the number of Pineco and Forretress you have in play. This attack does 30 damage to each of your Pineco and Forretress in play.

name: Groudon
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard the top 4 cards of your opponent's deck. If tails, discard the top 4 cards of your deck.

name: Gyarados
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Hitmontop
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Hitmontop by attacks is increased by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Ho-Oh
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard all Fire Energy attached to Ho-Oh.

name: Houndoom
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Fighting Pokemon in play, this attack does 20 damage plus 60 more damage.
Attack2Text: Your opponent discards a card from his or her hand.

name: Jirachi
AbilityText: Once during your turn, when you put Jirachi from your hand onto your Bench, you may flip 3 coins. For each heads, search your discard pile for a Psychic Energy card and attach it to Jirachi.
Attack1Text: Choose a number of your opponent's Stage 1 or Stage 2 Evolved Pokemon up to the amount of Energy attached to Jirachi. Remove the highest Stage Evolution card from each of those Pokemon and put those cards back into your opponent's hand.

name: Kyogre
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. If tails, this attack does 40 damage to each of your Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Leafeon
Attack1Text: Does 50 damage times the number of Special Conditions affecting the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Lucario
Attack1Text: Does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each of your Pokemon in the Lost Zone.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

name: Lugia
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Magmortar
Attack1Text: Discard the top 3 cards from your deck. This attack does 50 damage times the number of Energy cards you discarded.
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Fire Energy attached to Magmortar.

name: Ninetales
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a Fire Energy from your hand. If you do, draw 3 cards. This power can't be used if Ninetales is affected by a Special Condition.

name: Pachirisu
AbilityText: Once during your turn, when you put Pachirisu from your hand onto your Bench, you may attach up to 2 Lightning Energy cards from your hand to Pachirisu.
Attack1Text: Put all Energy cards attached to Pachirisu in the Lost Zone.

name: Palkia
Attack1Text: Switch Palkia with 1 of your Benched Pokemon. Then, your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.

name: Rayquaza
Attack1Text: Discard a Fire Energy and a Lightning Energy attached to Rayquaza.

name: Smeargle
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Smeargle is your Active Pokemon, you may look at your opponent's hand. If you do, choose a Supporter card you find there and use the effect of that card as the effect of this power. This power can't be used if Smeargle is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Umbreon
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects, including damage, done to Umbreon by attacks from your opponent's Pokemon than has any Poke-Powers or Poke-Bodies.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Ampharos
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 basic Energy cards and attach them to 1 of your Pokemon. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, Ampharos does 20 damage to itself.

name: Cleffa
AbilityText: As long as Cleffa is Asleep, prevent all damage done to Cleffa by attacks.
Attack1Text: Shuffle your hand into your deck, then draw 6 cards. Cleffa is now Asleep.

name: Feraligatr
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Granbull
Attack1Text: Granbull does 20 damage to itself. Switch Granbull with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Granbull.

name: Meganium
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Remove 2 damage counters from Meganium.

name: Mismagius
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Look at your opponent's hand. This attack does 30 damage times the number of Trainer, Supporter, and Stadium cards in your opponent's hand.

name: Mr. Mime
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may have both you and your opponent reveal your hands. This power can't be used if Mr. Mime is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Pidgeot
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, the attack cost of each of the Defending Pokemon's attacks is ColorlessColorless more.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Skarmory
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Metal Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokemon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Slowking
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 3 cards of either player's deck and put them back on top of that player's deck in any order. This power can't be used if Slowking is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Snorlax
Attack1Text: Remove all damage counters from Snorlax. Snorlax can't use Layabout during your next turn.
Attack2Text: Put 1 Energy card attached to Snorlax in the Lost Zone.

name: Tangrowth
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage times the number of Energy attached to Tangrowth.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed. If tails, put 1 Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon in the Lost Zone.

name: Typhlosion
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Energy attached to Typhlosion.

name: Tyrogue
AbilityText: As long as Tyrogue is Asleep, prevent all damage done to Tyrogue by attacks.
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance. Tyrogue is now Asleep.

name: Ursaring
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Weezing
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.
Attack2Text: Weezing does 90 damage to itself, and don't apply Weakness to this damage.

name: Zangoose
Attack1Text: During your next turn, Zangoose's Lost Claw attack's base damage is 80.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking and put it in the Lost Zone.

name: Croconaw
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Donphan
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 70 damage times the number of heads.

name: Flaaffy
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Flareon
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy attached to Flareon.

name: Jolteon
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Jolteon during your opponent's next turn.

name: Magby
AbilityText: As long as Magby is Asleep, prevent all damage done to Magby by attacks.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Burned. Magby is now Asleep.

name: Mime Jr.
AbilityText: As long as Mime Jr. is Asleep, prevent all damage done to Mime Jr. by attacks.
Attack1Text: Put the top card of your opponent's deck in the Lost Zone. Mime Jr. is now Asleep.

name: Pidgeotto
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are tails, this attack does nothing. For each heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Quilava
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy attached to Quilava.

name: Riolu
Attack1Text: Riolu can't attack during your next turn.

name: Seviper
Attack1Text: Seviper is now Poisoned.
Attack2Text: If Seviper is Poisoned, this attack does 20 damage plus 60 more damage and remove the Special Condition Poisoned from Seviper.

name: Vaporeon
Attack1Text: Remove 2 damage counters from Vaporeon.
Attack2Text: Choose 2 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 30 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Chikorita
Attack1Text: Remove 1 damage counter from Chikorita.
Attack2Text: Chikorita does 10 damage to itself.

Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Hitmonchan during your opponent's next turn.

Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Koffing
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

name: Mawile

Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed and discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Misdreavus
Attack2Text: Each player draws 3 cards.

AbilityText: As long as Phanpy has Energy attached to it, any damage done to Phanpy by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Pidgey
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Pokemon, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle Pidgey and all cards attached to it back into your deck.

name: Pineco
Attack1Text: During your next turn, Pineco's Surprise Attack attack's base damage is 80.
